thread.title: Lori Lennon Elliott
thread.title_full: CanvasOnSale reviewed by Lori Lennon Elliott

author: Lori Lennon Elliott
title: Lori Lennon Elliott
text:
I was a little hesitant at first about how it was going to come out. I ordered it for my sister as a surprise for her birthday. I figured if I didnt like it, I wont even give it to her, she'll never know. Well.... when it came in the mail, I opened it and was VERY pleasantly surprised. I LOVED it and the quality. I ordered the 12 X 16 it's crisp, clear and has beautiful color to it. Everyone I showed it to loved it also.. they asked who I got it from so maybe they'll be ordering from you too soon!
Thanks for such great work! Everyone was happy with it!
